Finding Stock Information for a specific stock:
 You can use the Stocks feature of the KIM app to access the stocks in KIM's portfolio.


The detailed steps in this section show you how to:

1. Access the Stocks:
 - Log in to the KIM app using your login credentials. You will end up on the KIM app home page.
 - On the screen, locate the "Stocks" button below the KIM logo.
 2. Find the information you are looking for:
 - Click on the "Stocks" button.
 - Scroll through the list of stocks, and click on the stock ticker you need information about.
 3. Exit the Stocks page:
 - After you are finished with viewing the stock information, go back to the top right corner of the screen to find the Menu bar.
 - Click on the Menu bar, and then select “Home”.


Finding a Stock Pitch:
You can use the Stock Pitch option of the KIM app to view this week’s stock pitch for KIM.


The detailed steps in this section show you how to:

1. Access the Stock Pitch:
 - Log in to the KIM app using your login credentials.
 - Go to the top right corner of your screen to find the Menu bar.
 - Click on the Menu bar, and then select “Stock Pitch”. This will open the Stock Pitch page.
 2. Find the information you are looking for:
 - Click on the Google Drive link.
 - Select the stock pitch you want to view.
 3. Exit the Stock Pitch page:
 - After you are finished with viewing the stock pitch, go back to the top right corner of the screen to find the Menu bar.
 - Click on the Menu bar, and then select “Home”.


Using the Training Guide:
You can use the Training Guide page of the KIM app to understand the activities carried out in KIM.


The detailed steps in this section show you how to:

1. Access the Training Guide:
 - Log in to the KIM app using your login credentials.
 - Go to the top right corner of your screen to find the Menu bar.
 - Click on the Menu bar, and then select “Training Guide”. This will open the Training Guide page.
 2. Find the information you are looking for:
 - Click on the Google Drive link.
 - Select the Training Guide.
 - Scroll through to find the information you want.
 3. Exit the Training Guide page:
 - After you are finished with viewing the Training Guide, go back to the top right corner of the screen to find the Menu bar.
 - Click on the Menu bar, and then select “Home”.


Using the Admin Tools:
You can use the Admin Tools feature of the KIM app if you are an administrator in the club.

 Imagine it is a new semester and you want to change the passwords of the user accounts.The detailed steps in this section show you how to:

1. Access the Admin Tools Feature:
 - Log in to the KIM app using your Administrator login credentials.
 - Go to the top right corner of your screen to find the Menu bar.
 - Click on the Menu bar, and then select “Admin Tools”. This will open the Admin Tools Page.
 2. Add or Change that account’s password:
 - Type the new password in the “New Account Password” textbox.
 - Press the “Add or change this account” button.
 - Your changes have been added to the database.
 3. Exit the Admin Tools page:
 - After you are finished with using the Admin Tools, go back to the top right corner of the screen to find the Menu bar.
 - Click on the Menu bar, and then select “Home”.


Logging out:
For security reasons, you will nedd to log out of the KIM app after using it.


The detailed steps in this section show you how to:

1. Access the Log Out feature:
 - When you are logged in to the KIM app, go to the top right corner of your screen to find the Menu bar.
 - Click on the Menu bar, and then select “Log Out”. This will log you out, and take you back to the login screen.
